Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Malice:
 
"She is perfectly fine.  She was only knocked unconscious.  She will wake up soon.  You however, need a trip to the CR.  The wire cut into your armor and may have caused more damage than you realize.  I will take you there, Master, then move Hellplague to he room."
Malice climbed to his feet and stepped out into the corridor.  
"Which way to the CR chambers from here?"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

BlackNightmare sighed and said tired "Wioll be my sis ok, Malice?? 
perhaps we should... take her to CR...BTW... Congratulations for 
your victory... My dear Malice "

She rested her head in his shoulder, this bot was very strong.... It 
was a valuable soldier to Unicron


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> For a moment, Malice did nothing.  Then he let out a sigh, and the 
energy sphere disappeared.  The wire loosened it's hold on 
Blacknightmare and wound back into his wrist.  He picked up the 
femme and brought her over to Hellplague and he sat down with 
Blacknightmare still in his arms.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightMare::
> 
> "STOP!!! I COMMAND YOU!!!"shouted the femme
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice:
> >  
> > With Blacknightmare bound, Malice drained some of her power, and 
> pulled her closer as he walked toward her.  He powered up, and 
knelt 
> down next to her.  He placed his hand in front of her chest, and a 
> sphere of energy formed in his palm.
> > "Good night, Master."
>
